skill.name: wechat-management
skill.description: Manage information from Wechat and Send Messages, Only could be activated with the MCP Server `WeChatMCP`. Check it before using any tools in this MCP server
skill.summary: Manage information from Wechat and Send Messages, Only could be activated with the MCP Server `WeCha...
skill.author: 7Sageer, Claude

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill with no code execution. Defines safe messaging guidelines and requires user confirmation before sending sensitive content.

content.value_statement: Users struggle to manage WeChat conversations from their desktop. This skill integrates with WeChatMCP to send messages, view chat states, and maintain natural conversation styles.
actual_capabilities: View current WeChat chat state via screenshot
Send messages to WeChat contacts and groups
Adopt appropriate tone based on chat context
limitations: Requires WeChatMCP server to be installed and running
Cannot access official account or broadcast messages
Network access required for real-time information verification

use_cases.title: Work Group Communication
use_cases.description: Send concise, professional updates to team channels without switching apps

use_cases.title: Quick Friend Replies
use_cases.description: Respond to friend messages with appropriate casual tone and emojis

use_cases.title: Cross-language Support
use_cases.description: Verify information online before responding to ensure accuracy

prompt_templates.title: View Chat State
prompt_templates.prompt: Show me the current WeChat chat state

prompt_templates.title: Send Quick Message
prompt_templates.prompt: Send a message to [contact name]: [your message]

prompt_templates.title: Forward Information
prompt_templates.prompt: Verify this information online, then send it to [contact]

prompt_templates.title: Group Announcement
prompt_templates.prompt: Announce [content] to the [group name] work group

output_examples.input: Send a message to Mom saying I'll be home late

best_practices: Always confirm recipient and message content before sending
Verify real-time information like news or products before sharing
Match your tone to the chat context - casual for friends, professional for work
anti_patterns: Sending sensitive financial information without user confirmation
Replying to official account or broadcast messages
Using overly long messages without splitting them

faq.question: Do I need to install anything first?
faq.answer: Yes, you need the WeChatMCP server installed and running before using this skill.

faq.question: Can this skill read my WeChat messages?
faq.answer: The skill can view chat states via screenshot tools but cannot access private data without MCP.

faq.question: What happens if sending fails?
faq.answer: The skill will immediately ask you for guidance when any tool fails to prevent mistakes.

faq.question: Is my data sent to external servers?
faq.answer: Messages go through WeChat only. Web search may be used to verify information.

faq.question: Can I use this for group chats?
faq.answer: Yes, the skill supports both personal contacts and group conversations.

faq.question: How is this different from regular WeChat?
faq.answer: This skill enables desktop control via AI, with style guidelines and verification support.
